attributes.action: Provide funding where possible to make toilets that flush with rainwater.
attributes.additional_details:
The girl child is most at risk as when she uses the bushes in the open as a toilet she is vulnerable to sexual attack.
Think about a stream.The stream provides many people with their water. That same stream is used to defecate in; wash animals; wash people After all this there is a huge population drinking from that same water. How disgusting is that? We have it so easy! Waste water like its infinite. Its not.
 Value water show your love sign the petition
attributes.background:
Earth is 70% water. 3% is drinkable. 1/3 is actually available.
There are 2.5bn people who don't have enough or no water 
14000 children die everyday from diarrhea caused by bad water. 
Rainwater flushing will mean that precious water is not used to flush but rather saved for people who need it
